original_text:
Is this the way you repay the Lord,
    you foolish and unwise people?
Is he not your Father, your Creator,
    who made you and formed you?
korean_text: 어리석고 지혜 없는 백성아 여호와께 이같이 보답하느냐 그는 네 아버지시요 너를 지으신 이가 아니시냐 그가 너를 만드시고 너를 세우셨도다

sentences.original_text: Is this the way you repay the Lord
Is he not your Father, your Creator
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희 아버지, 너희 창조자가 아니신가?

sentences.original_text: who made you and formed you?
